_meta.description: Design rules for the airtime design system. Use these constraints to ensure AI-generated interfaces match the system's visual language and avoid generic output.
_meta.usage: Load this file in /frontend-design or /apply-tokens to constrain generation to this system's tokens and patterns.

tokenUsage.color-background-primary: Use for primary page backgrounds, main content areas, cards, and modals
tokenUsage.color-background-secondary: Use for secondary surfaces — sidebars, nested cards, alternate rows, input fields
tokenUsage.color-background-tertiary: Use for tertiary surfaces — code blocks, badges, subtle highlights, hover states on secondary surfaces
tokenUsage.color-content-primary: Use for primary text, headings, and high-emphasis icons
tokenUsage.color-content-secondary: Use for secondary text, descriptions, labels, and medium-emphasis icons
tokenUsage.color-content-tertiary: Use for tertiary text, placeholders, disabled text, and low-emphasis icons
tokenUsage.color-highlight-primary: Use for borders, dividers, and subtle separators between surfaces
tokenUsage.color-highlight-secondary: Use for hover/focus backgrounds on interactive elements, and lighter dividers
tokenUsage.color-accent-teal: Use for primary interactive elements — links, buttons, active states, and focus rings
tokenUsage.color-accent-destructive: Use for error states, destructive actions, and warning indicators only
tokenUsage.color-shadow-small: Used internally by shadow tokens — do not apply directly as color
tokenUsage.color-shadow-medium: Used internally by shadow tokens — do not apply directly as color
tokenUsage.color-shadow-large: Used internally by shadow tokens — do not apply directly as color
tokenUsage.color-modeless-white: Use for text/icons on dark/colored backgrounds regardless of theme
tokenUsage.color-modeless-white-24: Use for translucent white overlays on dark backgrounds
tokenUsage.color-modeless-black: Use for text/icons on light backgrounds regardless of theme
tokenUsage.color-modeless-black-24: Use for translucent dark overlays on light backgrounds
tokenUsage.color-modeless-teal: Theme-independent accent color — use for brand elements that must not shift between themes
tokenUsage.color-modeless-destructive: Theme-independent destructive color — use for persistent error indicators
tokenUsage.size-0: Size token: 0 — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-05: Size token: 2px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-10: Size token: 4px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-15: Size token: 6px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-20: Size token: 8px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-30: Size token: 12px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-40: Size token: 16px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-50: Size token: 20px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-60: Size token: 24px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-70: Size token: 28px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-80: Size token: 32px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-100: Size token: 40px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-120: Size token: 48px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-140: Size token: 56px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-160: Size token: 64px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-180: Size token: 72px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.size-200: Size token: 80px — use for width, height, and fixed dimensions
tokenUsage.space-0: Space token: 0 — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-05: Space token: 2px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-10: Space token: 4px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-15: Space token: 6px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-20: Space token: 8px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-30: Space token: 12px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-40: Space token: 16px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-60: Space token: 24px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-80: Space token: 32px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.space-100: Space token: 40px — use for padding, margin, and gap
tokenUsage.radius-0: No rounding — use for sharp-edged elements
tokenUsage.radius-05: Subtle rounding (2px) — use for tags, small badges, and inline elements
tokenUsage.radius-10: Subtle rounding (4px) — use for tags, small badges, and inline elements
tokenUsage.radius-15: Standard rounding (6px) — use for buttons, inputs, and small cards
tokenUsage.radius-20: Standard rounding (8px) — use for buttons, inputs, and small cards
tokenUsage.radius-25: Medium rounding (10px) — use for cards, tiles, and medium containers
tokenUsage.radius-30: Medium rounding (12px) — use for cards, tiles, and medium containers
tokenUsage.radius-35: Medium rounding (14px) — use for cards, tiles, and medium containers
tokenUsage.radius-40: Medium rounding (16px) — use for cards, tiles, and medium containers
tokenUsage.radius-45: Large rounding (18px) — use for large cards, modals, and prominent containers
tokenUsage.radius-50: Large rounding (20px) — use for large cards, modals, and prominent containers
tokenUsage.radius-60: Large rounding (24px) — use for large cards, modals, and prominent containers
tokenUsage.radius-70: Large rounding (28px) — use for large cards, modals, and prominent containers
tokenUsage.radius-80: Large rounding (32px) — use for large cards, modals, and prominent containers
tokenUsage.radius-90: Extra large rounding (36px) — use for hero sections and prominent UI regions
tokenUsage.radius-100: Extra large rounding (40px) — use for hero sections and prominent UI regions
tokenUsage.radius-9999: Pill/circle shape — use for pill buttons, avatars, and fully rounded elements
tokenUsage.shadow-small: Use for subtle depth on buttons, dropdowns, and small interactive elements
tokenUsage.shadow-medium: Use for cards, popovers, and elevated surfaces
tokenUsage.shadow-large: Use for modals, dialogs, and the highest-elevation layers
tokenUsage.blur-small: Backdrop blur (8px) — use for frosted glass effects on overlapping surfaces
tokenUsage.blur-medium: Backdrop blur (16px) — use for frosted glass effects on overlapping surfaces
tokenUsage.blur-large: Backdrop blur (32px) — use for frosted glass effects on overlapping surfaces
tokenUsage.border-width-none: No border — use to explicitly remove borders
tokenUsage.border-width-thin: Thin border (1px) — use for dividers, keylines, and input outlines
tokenUsage.border-width-medium: medium border (2px) — use for emphasis borders and focus rings
tokenUsage.opacity-0: Fully transparent — use for hidden/faded-out states
tokenUsage.opacity-4: Near-invisible (4%) — use for subtle fill overlays and quaternary backgrounds
tokenUsage.opacity-8: Near-invisible (8%) — use for subtle fill overlays and quaternary backgrounds
tokenUsage.opacity-16: Low opacity (16%) — use for highlight fills, border alpha, and disabled icons
tokenUsage.opacity-24: Low opacity (24%) — use for highlight fills, border alpha, and disabled icons
tokenUsage.opacity-48: Medium opacity (48%) — use for scrims, overlay backgrounds, and de-emphasized elements
tokenUsage.opacity-50: Medium opacity (50%) — use for scrims, overlay backgrounds, and de-emphasized elements
tokenUsage.opacity-72: High opacity (72%) — use for secondary text, nav text, and frosted glass backgrounds
tokenUsage.opacity-100: Fully opaque — default, use when no transparency is needed
tokenUsage.easing-default: ease-out — use as default easing curve
tokenUsage.easing-in: ease-in — use as in easing curve
tokenUsage.easing-in-out: ease-in-out — use as in-out easing curve
tokenUsage.z-base: Default stacking — use for normal document flow

typography.fontFamily: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'SF Pro', 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif

spacing.description: Linear 4px base with 2px sub-steps at the small end. Size tokens use x10 naming (size-10 = 4px, size-20 = 8px). Jumps at larger values in spacing scale.

guidelines: Background tokens: apply to frames/containers only, not shapes, text, or strokes
Content tokens: apply to text, icons, and shape fills — not frame backgrounds
Highlight tokens: use for borders and interactive hover/focus states
Accent tokens: can be used across all contexts (text, background, border, icon)

radii.description: 2px increments up to radius-50, then 4px increments. radius-9999 is pill/circle.

antiPatterns.rule: Do not use Inter, Open Sans, Lato, Poppins, Montserrat — this system uses -apple-system
antiPatterns.reason: Generic font substitution is the most visible sign of AI-generated interfaces

antiPatterns.rule: Do not use indigo (#6366f1), purple (#8b5cf6), or violet (#7c3aed) gradients — they are not part of this system
antiPatterns.reason: Indigo/purple is the most common AI-generated default color and signals generic output

antiPatterns.rule: Only use the defined accent tokens (accent-teal) — do not introduce new accent colors
antiPatterns.reason: Invented accent colors break brand consistency

antiPatterns.rule: Do not apply the same border-radius to all elements — this system defines 15 distinct radius values for different contexts
antiPatterns.reason: Uniform 8px border-radius on everything is a hallmark of AI-generated interfaces

antiPatterns.rule: Do not use decorative gradients unless explicitly defined in the token set
antiPatterns.reason: Gratuitous gradients (especially purple-to-blue) are a top signal of AI-generated UI

antiPatterns.rule: Do not round every element — use the radius scale tokens and match radius to element size and role
antiPatterns.reason: Over-rounding creates a toy-like appearance inconsistent with most professional design systems

antiPatterns.rule: Use spacing tokens for all padding, margin, and gap — do not use arbitrary values like 15px or 22px
antiPatterns.reason: Arbitrary spacing values break the visual rhythm of the design system

antiPatterns.rule: Do not introduce colors outside the token palette — every color must come from a defined token
antiPatterns.reason: Invented colors break theme consistency and dark/light mode support

button.colors: Uses 7 color tokens: color-modeless-teal, color-modeless-black, color-highlight-primary, color-content-primary, color-highlight-secondary, color-accent-destructive, color-modeless-black-24
button.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: space-10, space-15, space-20, size-40, size-70
button.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-weight-button-default, font-size-button-default, line-height-button-default

controls.colors: Uses 9 color tokens: color-background-primary, color-content-tertiary, color-background-secondary, color-highlight-primary, color-content-primary, color-content-secondary, color-highlight-secondary, color-modeless-teal, color-accent-teal
controls.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: space-10, size-40, size-60, size-70, space-15, space-20
controls.radius: Uses radius tokens: radius-15, radius-10, radius-9999
controls.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-size-heading-medium, line-height-heading-medium, font-weight-semibold, font-size-body-medium, line-height-body-medium, font-weight-regular, font-size-button-default, line-height-button-default, font-weight-medium
controls.transitions: Uses transition tokens: duration-fast, easing-default, duration-normal, duration-slow

education.colors: Uses 6 color tokens: color-modeless-teal, color-shadow-medium, color-modeless-black, color-background-secondary, color-highlight-primary, color-content-primary
education.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: space-20, space-15, space-10, space-30
education.radius: Uses radius tokens: radius-20, radius-15, radius-10
education.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-size-heading-small, line-height-heading-small, font-weight-semibold, font-size-button-default, line-height-button-default, font-weight-medium, font-size-body-medium, line-height-body-medium, font-weight-regular

input.colors: Uses 8 color tokens: color-highlight-primary, color-background-primary, color-content-primary, color-modeless-teal, color-accent-teal, color-modeless-black, color-highlight-secondary, color-accent-destructive
input.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: size-70, size-80, space-15, space-20, space-10, size-40
input.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-size-body-medium, line-height-body-medium, font-weight-regular, font-size-heading-large, line-height-heading-large, font-weight-bold

menus.colors: Uses 4 color tokens: color-background-tertiary, color-highlight-primary, color-shadow-medium, color-highlight-secondary

others.colors: Uses 13 color tokens: color-modeless-teal, color-modeless-black, color-highlight-primary, color-highlight-secondary, color-modeless-black-24, color-content-tertiary, color-background-secondary, color-shadow-medium, color-picker-hue, color-modeless-white, color-shadow-small, color-picker-color, color-content-primary
others.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: size-40, space-10, space-15, space-60, space-20, size-70
others.radius: Uses radius tokens: radius-9999, radius-30, radius-10, radius-15, radius-20
others.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-size-body-small, line-height-body-small, font-weight-bold, font-size-body-medium, line-height-body-medium, font-weight-regular

rows.colors: Uses 5 color tokens: color-content-primary, color-highlight-primary, color-accent-destructive, color-background-tertiary, color-content-secondary
rows.spacing: Uses spacing/size tokens: space-10, space-15, size-40, space-20
rows.radius: Uses radius tokens: radius-15, radius-10, radius-9999
rows.typography: Uses typography tokens: font-family-primary, font-size-body-medium, line-height-body-medium, font-weight-regular, font-size-heading-large, line-height-heading-large, font-weight-bold, font-size-body-small, line-height-body-small
